string-array.name: interrupt_filter_sync_to_watch_steps
string-array.item: 1. On your computer, make sure you have access to ADB. If you don\'t, you can get it from this thread on XDA.

2. Go to Developer Options on your watch. If not already visible, enable it by heading to Settings -> System -> About, then tapping \'Build number\' until you get a popup saying you are now a developer. You should now have Developer Options in your settings.
3. Enable ADB Debugging and Debug over WiFi from Developer Options on your watch.
4. Connect your watch to your computer, either by USB or via Wi-Fi (You\'ll need to run \'adb connect\' followed by your watch IP address)
5. Open a new terminal on your computer and type \'adb devices\', your watch should show up. Accept any popups on your watch.

6. Run the following command: adb shell settings put secure enabled_notification_listeners com.google.android.wearable.app/com.google.android.clockwork.stream.NotificationCollectorService:com.boswelja.devicemanager/com.boswelja.devicemanager.dndsync.DnDLocalChangeService
